name: Nala
descriptionText: Nala is a 2-year-old probable Sammy/Siberian mix who is looking for a new home. She is very friendly, does need some "table manners" training.  The E-collar is off, of course (picture was taken just after spaying), but I have no new pictures of her. though the video was taken after her recovery

name: MIA
breed: American Pit Bull Terrier / Mixed (short coat)
descriptionText:
This gorgeous girl is MIA, a 7-8 month old, 45 pound, American Pit Bull Terrier mix with one blue eye and one brown eye. Mia’s fur is a beautiful golden brown with white. Mia is an amazing puppy who knows no stranger. She loves all people, young and old, and is fantastic with dogs of all sizes. Despite her size, Mia is a BIG cuddler and thinks she's a lap dog; she is happy to climb into your lap and take a nap there.
Since living in foster care, Mia has learned to ring a bell to go outside and has learned to walk nicely on a leash. Mia loves toys! She regularly pulls them out of the toy box with which to play. She shares toys very easily with the other dogs in her foster home. Mia also likes to play fetch, bringing the ball back and dropping it for another round. Mia is a smart, obedient, wonderful dog!!
Because Mia is a puppy, she requires an adopter who will dedicate time and effort to Mia so she continues with her basic manners. It would be best if Mia’s adopter can come home mid-day so that she have a potty break. Mia is an awesome puppy who enjoys playing games, getting and giving cuddles, chasing toys, and spending time with her favorite people and other dogs.
This dog has received veterinary exams, age appropriate inoculations, been tested for parasites, dewormed, placed on monthly heartworm preventative, spayed, and microchipped. ADOPTION APPLICATIONS are available for online completion and submission through our website - www.acaringplacehs.org

name: Coco
descriptionText:
Coco is a sweet and loving Terrier born 2/5/16. He really enjoys playing with the other dogs and run around in the yard. He also loves to sun bathe in the yard or next to your sunny patio door. Coco is crate trained and Potty pad trained but he really would like to go outside to do his business. He loves to be held and loved on, but then he also loves to play with you and his toys. Coco is very curious and will watch you to see what you are doing or bringing into the house. He doesn’t mind the cats and leaves them alone as long as they don’t take his toys. Coco is still a baby and requires a lot more training and love, will that be you. Coco would do best in a home with another dog to play with.

SECURE FENCING REQUIRED FOR ALL OF OUR RESCUED DOGS.

If you are considering adopting a dog through HALO Here are some helpful hints:

Bring pictures of your yard to show secure fencing. Most of our dogs require a 6 foot fenced yard. Yards must be cleared of any fox tail weeds.

We do adopt small dogs to apartments or condo and need to see pictures of the patio or balcony area. If you rent, please bring copy of your lease to show you can have pets and any size restrictions.

We do not adopt to homes with children under the age of five unless we know the history of the dog with young children. All Children MUST be present at adoption.

If you own a dog and are looking for a friend please bring your dog with you so they can be introduced.

name: Lucas
descriptionText:
This is Lucas - He is very sweet, loves to play and likes long naps. He sleeps through the night, is potty trained, plays well with other dogs and puppies. Reminds us of a little black lab.

SECURE FENCING REQUIRED FOR ALL OF OUR RESCUED DOGS.

If you are considering adopting a dog through HALO Here are some helpful hints:

Bring pictures of your yard to show secure fencing. Most of our dogs require a 6 foot fenced yard. Yards must be cleared of any fox tail weeds.

We do not adopt to homes with children under the age of five unless we know the history of the dog with young children. All Children MUST be present at adoption.

If you own a dog and are looking for a friend please bring your dog with you so they can be introduced.

name: ! Harley
breed: Australian Shepherd / Black Labrador Retriever / Mixed

name: Scrumptious Ms Suutra
breed: Labrador Retriever / American Staffordshire Terrier (short coat)
descriptionText:
Hi, my name’s Suutra so named for the GOOD Karma I brought to my rescue friends for all the GREAT help I give Mare with the other dogs in her home! I'm a 1 year old Lab / Amstaff blend who's known to ALWAYS be happy, smiling and full of life but consistently CALM, QUIET and extremely gentle ~ especially considering my youthful age ! It's really VERY easy for me to be so well behaved since I've spent my entire life in an indoor home but I'm always up for a good romp with my canine friends or a long walk with my human(s). I'm a DELIGHTFUL young Lady who just loooooooves belly rubs! Mare says I'm a SWEETIE, claiming I’m nothing but solid love through and through and by far one of the easiest dogs she's EVER had the pleasure of hosting ~ pretty HIGH praise coming from someone who's known to be sooooo picky about behavior, believe me!!! I really enjoy being with nice people and all the fun dogs here, and I especially looooooove, Luv, LOVE the children that visit! I am sooooooo very grateful to have this opportunity to experience how wonderful life can be! I’m EASY GOING, laid back and always display impeccable manners both indoors AND outside. I enjoy long walks, evening strolls down quiet streets, playing with other dogs and children, riding in the car, hiking and/or doing just about anything that makes you happy so that we can spend family time together! I'm also house, car, crate and leash trained; sitting on cue (instantly and without being asked, thank you very much) and walking politely on lead as a genteel girl should. I’m a VERY SWEET, gentle soul who lives to please my people so I long to find that special person(s) who will appreciate my GENTLE, giving personality and the life time of love and devotion I’ll shower YOU with in return!
Why wait??? Contact us via our petabulls.com website or simply call Mare at (505)316-2089 for a private "By Appointment Only" showing at our weekly "Adoptions in the Park" !!!

name: Olaf
descriptionText: Olaf was found with his friends, Elsa and Anna on the streets in Loma Linda.  He is a lover boy.  He will crawl into your lap and burrow his head into you.  Olaf also likes to play with Elsa and Anna.  Olaf is still a little nervous after being on the streets so he will need a gentle family.

name: Dover
descriptionText:
This is Dover - he is very boisterous, loves to let you know he is there and wanting to play. He is potty trained. Dover loves to carry his little soft toys and teddy bears around the house. He loves to be held and loved on, which he also gives back big kisses. Dove gets along with other dogs and especially his siblings. Remember that he is still very much the puppy and needs lots of training to teach him to be the loving and special baby that he is. Dover is waiting for his loving family to come and take him home.

SECURE FENCING REQUIRED FOR ALL OF OUR RESCUE

If you are considering adopting a dog through HALO Here are some helpful hints:

Bring pictures of your yard to show secure fencing. Most of our dogs require a 6 foot fenced yard. Yards must be cleared of any fox tail weeds.

We do adopt small dogs to apartments or condo and need to see pictures of the patio or balcony area. If you rent, please bring copy of your lease to show you can have pets and any size restrictions.

We do not adopt to homes with children under the age of five unless we know the history of the dog with young children. All Children MUST be present at adoption.

If you own a dog and are looking for a friend please bring your dog with you so they can be introduced.

name: Gus
descriptionText:
This is Gus or as we call him now Gus - Gus.  He is so sweet, loves to be held and gives sweet little licks.  He is potty trained and sleeps through the night. The most special thing about him is his jumping, like a little fluffy jumping bean... He can jump on his back to paws for quite awhile to say look at me, here I am, lets play. He gets along very well with other dogs and all of his siblings. He is just the sweetest and loving little boy and wants to go to a very loving family that will give him lots of love. Remember that he is a puppy and still needs lots of training and then he will be the perfect little pup for any family.

For more information contact starshalodogs@yahoo.com

SECURE FENCING REQUIRED FOR ALL OF OUR RESCUED DOGS.

If you are considering adopting a dog through HALO Here are some helpful hints:

name: ! Brownie
Anna
descriptionText: Anna was found with her friends Elsa and Olaf on the streets in Loma Linda.  Anna may take a minute to warm up to new people, but once she does, she is playful and likes to snuggle.  Anna may be wary of new dogs but she will likely loosen up as she begins to feel more secure now that she is off  of the streets.  Anna needs a home that will be patient and loving with her as she learns to trust humans.  She has made great strides already.

name: Mahlie
descriptionText:
This is Mahlie, born 2/15/16 - she is very sweet, like her sisters and brothers, except she is also adventurous. She loves to explore and check things out. She plays very well with other puppies, dogs and the rabbits. She sleeps through the night and takes a couple naps throughout the day. She is potty and kennel trained. She entertains herself and likes to play in boxes.

SECURE FENCING REQUIRED FOR ALL OF OUR RESCUED DOGS.

If you are considering adopting a dog through HALO Here are some helpful hints:

Bring pictures of your yard to show secure fencing. Most of our dogs require a 6 foot fenced yard. Yards must be cleared of any fox tail weeds.

We do adopt small dogs to apartments or condo and need to see pictures of the patio or balcony area. If you rent, please bring copy of your lease to show you can have pets and any size restrictions.

We do not adopt to homes with children under the age of five unless we know the history of the dog with young children. All Children MUST be present at adoption.

If you own a dog and are looking for a friend please bring your dog with you so they can be introduced.

name: Stunning Ms Sarafina
descriptionText: Hi there, my name's Sarafina but all my friends call me “Sarie” and you should too 'cause everyone is MY friend! I’m a 1 year old American Staffordshire Terrier and soooooo WELL BEHAVED that I'm learning quickly to become the consummate Lady ~ a title I crave! I do enjoy frolicking with my human and canine friends outdoors though I behave with proper decorum and perfect manners at all times ~ one must set a good example for their breed you know. I consider getting dirty or misbehaving as beneath my character, keeping myself clean and correct in every setting. If you like walks or hiking then I’m your girl, exercise is something I believe in to maintain my PERFECT figure! I enjoy all my friends at our multi dog indoor foster home and am gracious to everyone I meet, it ALWAYS pays to be a gracious Lady. Typical of the Amstaff breeding, I have a stable, even temperament, am calm, HIGHLY INTELLIGENT, easy to train, AFFECTIONATE, very GENTLE and extremely well behaved indoors knowing that’s the place to be kicked back. I’m a very SWEET girl who has lived in an indoor home my entire life so I'm super well socialized, housebroken, crate trained and even sit (automatically, thank you) for treats. I love to play with toys, other dogs, human children and especially enjoy car rides! I have a heart of gold, and I'm FABULOUS with children because I love humans of all sizes. I learn new lessons extremely fast and love to please, especially in response to an experienced, calm, assertive pack leader that I respect. My foster Mom says I’m the perfect breed ambassador, absolutely amazing to work with and an exceptional companion with a personality as LOVELY as my looks ~ how very nice of her to notice MY pawstive attributes!Why wait??? Contact us via our petabulls.com website or simply call Mare at (505)316-2089 for a private "By Appointment Only" showing at our weekly "Adoptions in the Park" !!!

name: Rocket
Bambino
descriptionText:
Bambino is a 5 year old Boston Terrier. He gets along with kids and dogs, unknown about cats. He is crate trained but was a mostly outdoor dog in his prior home, so he will need house training. If he was inside he was in a crate, never loose. He is working on his housebreaking and doing good with consistency. Bambino is a little guy, with tons of love to share. Bambino is looking for a home with a yard and maybe a canine sibling. 
Bambino's adoption fee: $250

name: Kindhearted Ms Keisha
descriptionText: Hi, my name's Keisha! I’m 2 year old spayed female Yellow Lab mix who's known to be a HAPPY, healthy, outgoing, SUPER SMART, well mannered and very AFFECTIONATE young Lady who's totally ready to find my fur~ever home. I absolutely love to play with other dogs and humans (if someone initiates the game, pays to mind one's manners ya know) and I've completely mastered the “sit”, “stay”, “wait” and “load up” commands plus I’m even spotlessly house and crate trained ~ and even leash trained too ~ putting my head right through the loop and walking out nicely on lead to go for another adventure! I’m a VERY FRIENDLY girl who loves to run and play outside with humans or dogs and am very WELL BEHAVED indoors, settling in nicely at your feet so we can read, nap or watch movies. I also love long walks or hikes with my favorite human(s), or just about anything you care to do that lets us spend time together. I do very well with other dogs, playing with all my friends in an indoor multi dog foster home because I truly enjoy their company ~ so much so in fact that my rescue friends have promised to find me a home with a nice male canine companion to share my life with ! I’d make a FABULOUS addition to any family looking to add another member to their pack. I’m a SWEETHEART who loves to please her people and is eager to learn new things. I’d really like to have a special person(s) of my very own, one who’ll fulfill my dream of having a pack leader who'll teach me new things and maybe even take me to classes where I can show off OUR talents. Could you, would YOU be MY new fur~ever friends ?!?Why wait??? Contact us via our petabulls.com website or simply call Mare at (505)316-2089 for a private "By Appointment Only" showing at our weekly "Adoptions in the Park" !!!

name: Baby Seattle Slew
Baby Affirmed
Cute LITTLE Katniss ~ POCKET American Bully
descriptionText: Hi there, my name's Katniss but Mare and The Team all call me "Kit Kat" cause I'm a true "sugar rush," I'm sooooo SWEET ! :) I’m pure bred 16 month old, spayed female American Bully (Amstaff with Frenchie Bulldog back blood) ~ a true POCKET PIT who's known to be a total house dog that aims to please her people! I’m a super friendly, lovable clown that adores hugs and frolicking with my human and canine friends. Mare says she fell in love with my lively eyes and goofy grins, you can just see the LOADS of character in my silly facial expressions. She tells everyone that I’m nothing but solid love and laughter through and through cause I’m ALWAYS happy, smiling and FULL of life ~ just look at my photos ~ I smile ALL the time !!! While we realize this listing indicates I'm an American Staffordshire Terrier (there's no designation for my breed in the listing programs yet), I'm really a pure bred “American Bully”! We're a newer, special, improved version of the Bully breedings via the Gotti and Razor's Edge bloodlines. As typically noted in the American Bully's, I have a SUPER stable, even temperament so I'm CALM, highly intelligent, EASY to train, super AFFECTIONATE, extremely GENTLE and very WELL BEHAVED indoors knowing that's the place to be kicked back. I’m a calm, QUIET, gentle young Lady who has spent her entire life in an indoor home so I’m easy going indoors (and out) and always display impeccable manners, lounging quietly at your feet with a favorite bone to be the perfect companion. If you like walks, hiking or running, I’m your girl ~ the consummate athlete with “PERFECT pace” for all you runners out there! I’m a very sweet girl who’s super socialized, housebroken, crate (though I certainly don’t require one), car and leash trained: walking very politely on lead as a true lady should. And, I even sit nicely for treats (immediately AND without being asked, thank you very much :) I love to play with toys, fetch the ball and especially enjoy touring in an automobile, playing with children and engaging in just about anything that makes you happy so that we can spend family time together! I have a heart of gold, and am super good with children because I love humans of all sizes but careful with the cats or small furry creatures cause ones that ruuuuun can look a bit like interactive play toys to my semi puppy eyes :) I learn really quickly and love to please, especially in response to an experienced, calm, assertive pack leader that I respect. Mare says I’m the PERFECT companion because I have a heart as BIG as all outdoors. I long to find that special person(s) who will appreciate my lovely personality and the life time of devotion I will gladly give them in return!Why wait??? Contact us via our petabulls.com website or simply call Mare at (505)316-2089 for a private "By Appointment Only" showing at our weekly "Adoptions in the Park" !!!

name: Prince
breed: Chihuahua / American Eskimo Dog / Mixed (short coat)
descriptionText: PICK ME! PICK ME! INTRODUCING........ PRINCE.........Prince is about 4 mos. old and is just a little love muffin!  He is the cutest, sweetest thing in the world!  He is looking for a home with his mommy, Queenie because they are very bonded to each other.  Prince loves to play, snuggle and give kisses.  If you would like to meet this little bundle of joy, please contact Toni at awishforanimals@yahoo.com or (310) 525-0339.

name: Prince
Frito
descriptionText: Frito is a sweet Teri-Poo who's about 2 years old and weighs 14 pounds.  He's very affectionate and attentive and eager to please.  This sweet guy is from a shelter in Tecate, Mexico.  He was most likely on the streets for a while judging by his condition when he came in.  But once he got cleaned up and some good nutrition and lots of lovin', he morphed into a happy playful pooch who loves to cuddle as much as he loves to go for walks.  Frito greets everyone with a wag and wiggle and gets along well with other dogs and is gentle with kids.  He's not a barker nor demanding.  Frito will melt your heart with his gentle doggie kisses.  He'll be a wonderful addition to any famly.

name: Queenie
breed: American Eskimo Dog / Japanese Chin / Mixed (medium coat)
descriptionText: PICK ME! PICK ME! INTRODUCING..... QUEENIE.......Queenie is about a year old and is just a love!  She is a wonderful mommy to her one and only puppy Prince.  We would like to place them together since they are so bonded.  She is very smart, sensitive and loving!  She weighs about 10 lbs. and is just beautiful!  She is looking for a warm and wonderful new home!  Please contact Toni at awishforanimals@yahoo.com or (310) 525-0339.

name: Tanner
Addy
descriptionText: Addy is cute little Teri-Poo who's about 2 years old and weighs approximately 11 pounds.  She's a mellow girl who's super affectionate and smart.  This luck girl was rescued from Mexico and spent some time on the street so still gets a little spooked with loud noises outside but has adjusted well to being on a leash.  She gets along well with other dogs and will make a wonderful, devoted companion.

name: Ellie Mae
descriptionText: 1 year, sweet girl

name: Cookie
descriptionText: Cookie is 11 mo old & a very pretty girl.  She loves to play with dogs & people.  She still needs to learn some manners so we do not recommend her for a home with young kids.

name: Athena-Roxy
descriptionText: Hello, I'm Roxy. I am 4 years old and very friendly. If you'd like to meet me please fill out an application.

name: Bruce
descriptionText:
Bruce is a 8-week old male Shepherd mix puppy we rescued along with his mom Coral and siblings. More to come!


Adoption fee: $350, includes neuter and current vaccinations. Additional donations always welcome.



If you are interested in adopting this dog please visit this link to get the adoption process started.



We hold adoption events from San Francisco to the South Bay. Most dogs will be ready to go home the day of the adoption event. We accept credit cards and cash for our adoption fees. While adoption events are a great showcase for these amazing dogs, you don't need an adoption event to adopt a dog.  Check out our adoptable pups, submit an application, and then meet them at their foster home!



We try to post the dogs that are attending on Facebook before the event, please visit and like us on Facebook.



To View other dogs up for adoption please visit our website.

name: Tucker
descriptionText:
Tucker is a year old & approx 15lbs.  He is a very sweet boy who just wants to make you happy.  He gets along great with all size dogs. If you would like to meet this sweet boy pls fill out an application & come fall in love with this sweetheart.
http://www.muttsinneed.org/adoption-application.html

name: Lily
descriptionText:
Lilly is a 2-year old female Chihuhua-Doxie mix we rescued from Kerman. She weighs about 8 lbs and is said to be a joy to be around. She gets along with dogs, cats and kids as well! According to her Kerman foster, she isn't a barker either. More to come!


Adoption fee: $250, includes spay and current vaccinations. Additional donations always welcome. 



If you are interested in adopting this dog please visit this link to get the adoption process started.

We try to post the dogs that are attending on Facebook before the event, please visit and like us on Facebook.



To View other dogs up for adoption please visit our website.

Willow is a 6-month old female cattle dog mix we rescued from Fresno. She is super sweet and loves people! More info and better photos to come.


Adoption fee: $325, includes spay and current vaccinations. Additional donations always welcome.

name: Sarge
breed: German Shorthaired Pointer / Weimaraner / Mixed (short coat)

name: Zoey
descriptionText: Zoey is 11 weeks of age. She is listed as a Bulldog mix. She is good with cats and other dogs. She is very playful. At 11 weeks , she is not house trained. She is adorable.

name: Frea
descriptionText: Frea is a Lab/Bulldog mix, She is black with under tones of brown. She is around a year in age. She gets along with other dogs. Very friendly. Guessing weight around 40 lbs. She is very loving, and also very energetic. She will make someone a wonderful companion.

name: Ellie Mae
descriptionText: Elie Mae is a female Pug/Chi mix. She gets along with other dogs. She is not good with cats. She was turned in with another, since they were going off to college. Age, and HW status not determined.

name: Harley Nevada
descriptionText:
Hey, there – I’m Harley Nevada, a cat so cool, you’ll need a sweater just to look at me! But really, I am a great cat. I do like to spend some time chilling outside, but it’s not a necessity. I enjoy attention – I want play time, cuddle time and time to chat. I will sleep on the bed. Oh, and when I say chat, I mean CHAT! I will tell you all about my day. I’m 5 years old, and in great health.
Come chill with this cool dude!
All our cats are spayed/neutered, up to date on vaccines, tested for FeLV/FIV, microchipped, treated for parasites and checked by a vet before adoption. To apply please go to http://www.carmah.org/info/adoption. Questions can be sent to: adoptacat@carmah.org
OUR KITTEN POLICY: Kittens under the age of 6 months need other cats for social development and fewer behavioral problems - and they keep each other company when people aren't around. So, we adopt out kittens in pairs, or with their charming momcats, or into home already having a young or active cat.

name: Jax
TOM  aka Scrappy
Pandora
breed: Tabby / Domestic Short Hair / Mixed (short coat)

name: Cletus-ADOPTED
Bubba-ADOPTED
Merle-ADOPTED
Buford-ADOPTED
Jo
descriptionText: Jo was found by our UPS driver at an abandoned business where there were no houses.  He called us and we came and got Jo.  She was terrified and initially was aggressive with the volunteer and could not hold her bowels.  She was a very sad sight.  Jo has come around in a very short time, but can still be a little shy around strangers.  I think with lots of love and attention, she will be a wonderful member to any family.

name: ERNIE
Litter D which stands for Darling all adopted
descriptionText: video on TLC FB page

name: Clover ADOPTED
descriptionText: video on TLC FB page

name: Delaney, Darla, Delilah all adopted
descriptionText: video on TLC FB page

name: Carmen, Cashmere & DOve K
descriptionText: arrives 5/14 ETA 11:00  Mom is HB

name: Tyga
descriptionText: Tyga is a very young male Pit. We are guessing age around 8 to 10 months. He weighs around 35 lbs. Please contact the shelter to confirm. He was turned in to the shelter, due to an illness in the family. He is very sweet, very energetic, very playful, and HE LOVES HIS TOYS!

name: Lucy
descriptionText: This cutie is in foster care in Johnson City, TN.

name: Dakota
descriptionText:
To adopt fill out an adoption form: 

https://secure.jotformpro.com/MSAR/dog

Name: Dakota

Age: 5 years

Gender: male 
Breed: Woolie Husky
Weight: 67 lb 
Dog friendly: Yes 
Cat friendly: Yes
Child Friendly: Yes
House trained: Yes
Crate trained: Yes
Energy level: Moderate
Temperament: Loving, friendly, outgoing, intelligent
Adoption Fee: $275 Plus Tax 
To adopt, go to: http://www.mendingspirits.org/adopt.html

About Me:



Kisses. Do you like kisses? I like giving kisses. In fact, I am such

a loving boy that some humans get tired of my kisses. How is that

possible???


My name is Dakota and my nickname is Bubba. I must be pretty special


to have TWO names! Well actually I am very special in many ways. I have an incredible story actually and I am very lucky to have be alive after the hardship I endured long ago. Thankfully my days of neglect ended when I was swept up by loving people and properly treated for a simple medical condition
 called Diabetes Insipidus. I am on a low cost daily medication that involves giving me eye drops 2 times a day, Yep that is it and the best part is it costs less then 40$ a month. Its really no issue at all and I am very healthy overall.  Okay so now on to the good stuff......




I love making new friends, especially at the dog


park. I don't run a lot because I get tired easily but I do like to

show the little puppies how things work in our doggie world. I like to

show them the ropes. I can never have enough friends, although I

sometimes find it hard to share my toys. I'm used to being the only

dog in the house but my cousins and I play well together when we

visit. The littlest cousin is a girl and we like to hangout and chill.

My other cousin is a young lab and he is too hyper for me.

Occasionally I have to yell at him to settle down.


My favorite treats are dried sweet potatoes, but really I like all

foods. Yogurt, peanut butter and chicken are some of my favorites. I

love long walks on chilly days. My thick double coat is warm and my

paws are perfect for playing in the snow! I love Minnesota winters! I

enjoy being outside but not on really hot days, then I just want to

stay in the cool air conditioning and lay on my blanket. I don't

typically jump onto the couch either, I prefer the cool floor.

name: Scooter - PETSMART
Pinky - PETSMART
Tango
descriptionText: Tango is an unaltered male Bully Breed. He is good with other dogs. He has had much attention, since he wants it at the shelter. We are guessing him to be around 10 months of age or maybe even younger. His weight is around 25 lbs. He loves to play , and and very sweet.

name: Hank
descriptionText: Hank is being returned to the shelter. He came into the shelter in terrible shape. Just wait til you see the new pics of him!! He is awesome looking, filled out, and gorgeous. Unfortunately, he thinks the bunny is his dinner. He will be back at the shelter on Sat. If interested in him. Hopefully, we can get him there by Friday, to get new pics of him.

name: Duchess
descriptionText: Anyone missing your baby girl? Duchess is the sweetest girl. She has to belong to someone. If your girl, the shelter is open from 9-12 tomorrow. The number for the shelter is 256-771-7889.

name: Milkway
descriptionText:
Born: 2/13/16

All cats are microchipped, neutered, dewormed, current on vaccines, and FeLV/FIV/HW tested.

Please fill out the adoption application and call 847-961-5541 with any additional questions.

name: Maceo Lonestar
descriptionText:
Meet Maceo who's looking for a home!  Maceo is a Lab mix, approximately 5 years old, and weighing about 50 pounds.   Maceo gets along with everyone he meets...kids and adults as well as other dogs. He truly is amazing, such a sweetheart! Loves to go for his walks and is so gentle outside. He will melt your heart! He will be a wonderful, loyal home companion that will snuggle next to you or be happy laying down at your feet. Just wants to be loved! He is all up to date on vaccinations, neutered, and micro chipped. He can be visited at our Rockaway Mall Adoption Center.

If you are interested in meeting Maceo go to EHRDOGS.ORG and submit an application.  Don't forget to ask for MACEO LONESTAR!!!!

descriptionText:

name: Teddy FOBCAS
descriptionText: Teddy is a 1 yr. old Pom/Chi mix, adorable and so sweet!! He loves everyone he has met, super friendly, great with other dogs, gets along with cats. He is neutered, UTD on vaccinations, and microchipped. He is currently in foster care with Friends of Bedford County Animal Shelter.  If you are interested in Teddy, please email fobcasfriends@gmail.com.

name: Tulip
descriptionText:
Hi! I'm Tulip and am a three week old female (born 4/16/2016) Rat Terrier/Feist Mix. I was born in a litter of three brothers and three sisters who are also at Wish Bone with our mother Sadie. I am a darling girl who is looking for my forever home.
My minimum adoption amount is $345.
A $100 deposit will hold Tulip until her available adoption date of 6/11/2016.
Tulip will be spayed prior to adoption, microchipped, vaccinated, fecal checked, dewormed, and is on flea and heartworm preventatives.
For information about this dog's breed(s), visit: http://www.dogbreedinfo.com/abc.htm

name: Cookie
breed: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel / Dachshund / Mixed
descriptionText: Meet Cookie. This beautiful, approx. 8-10 month old, owner surrender never knew anything except the inside of an apartment. Now at Husky House, she is looking for her loving forever home.

name: Sweetie Pie
Sonny
descriptionText: Meet Sonny. This handsome boy was found as a stray in California. Sonny will need a home with prior husky experience. Sonny can be picky when it comes to his canine friends, and would do best as the only dog in the home. Please no homes with cat or young children. Interested in adopting/fostering Sonny? Please visit www.huskyhouse.org to fill out an application.

descriptionText: This dog is located in Tennessee. Adoption Donation $150 in TN, $200 plus transportation fee for out of state adoptions.

name: Kobe
descriptionText:
Adoption Pending
Meet Kobe. Kobe is a typical husky boy who can be an escape artist. He will need a home with prior husky experience. Interested in adopting Kobe? Please visit www.huskyhouse.org to fill out an application.

name: Joni
breed: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel / Mixed (medium coat)
descriptionText:
Joni is a beautiful black King Charles Spaniel mix who came into the shelter with her brother, Chachi.  She is young, between five to six months old, and is going to be a small dog, who will make a great family pet or companion dog.  All Joni needs is some TLC!  Although Joni is stressed by the shelter noises, she is not as scared as her bother, Chachi.  She is a truly a people dog, and her favorite thing is being carried around like a princess!  If you are interested in adopting or fostering Joni, or her sweet brother, Chachi, please contact the Euless Animal Shelter.  These babies are in urgent need of someone to give them a loving home!
(Joni is in pink!)
 
***If you're interested in me, please contact the Euless Animal Shelter at 1517 Westpark Way in Euless -  817-685-1594 and PLEASE REFER TO MY PET ID #16481. Thank you!***

name: Nellie Lonestar RM
descriptionText:
Meet Nellie!!!  Nellie is a Terrier mix, approximately 5 years old, and weighing about 30 pounds.   Nellie gets along with people and with other dogs.  She is arriving 5/21/16 and will be up to date on vaccinations, spayed, and micro chipped.  

If you are interested in meeting Nellie go to EHRDOGS.ORG and submit an application.  Don't forget to ask for NELLIE LONESTAR!!!!

name: Flokey
descriptionText: Meet Flokey. Flokey is a approx. 1-2 year old husky boy who was found as a stray in California. He is dog and people friendly. Flokey is a very talkative boy! Interested in adopting Flokey? Please visit www.huskyhouse.org to fill out an application.

name: Chachi
breed: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel / Mixed (medium coat)

name: Junebug
descriptionText: My name is Junebug, and I am about 2-3 years old, and weigh about 11 pounds. I am a very loving long little lap doggie. I love to run and play with the other dogs, and cuddle up with my foster Mom at night.. adore those belly rubs..or just hold me and pet me...  I am all tail wags.  If you might be my forever new family, Please email k9kids4adoption@gmail.com  for an application, and tell us a little about the home you have for me, where you are located, and a phone number would also be nice....I am waiting. An approved application, Someone that has time for me, a great home with a fenced yard, and an adoption fee of $225 is required.......Until we have received your completed application we can not arrange a meeting....

name: Waffles
Rosemary
descriptionText:
Rosemary has just arrived at the rescue and is doing well.  She came from Tijuana, Mexico where her life was not very easy.  She's now gotten all of her medical needs taken care of  (shots, spay, microchip, etc.) and she is ready to roll (find her forever home).  Rosemary is the cutest little girl and we are sure she won't hang with us very long.  She is very sweet and gets along with other dogs and cats.  If you would like to meet Rosemary,  
please go to our website  
www.stpacossecondchancedogrescue.org
 to submit an application.  Rosemary's adoption fee is $300

name: Cashmere
descriptionText: Cashmere is a lovely short haired torti in a loving foster home.  TO LEARN MORE ABOUT HER, PLEASE CONTACT HER FOSTER MOM, JENNY, AT peytongma@yahoo.com.  Jenny is keeping Cashmere.We encourage you to file an on line application for this or any of our pets by clicking HERE.  Please include the name of the cat(s) or kitten(s). Stop by anytime when we're open.  Please visit our web site by clicking www.animal-aid.com to see the hours for our Adoption Center located at 571 NE44th St. (NW corner of Prospect (44th and 6th) in Oakland Park, FL 33334 and our pets available for adoption. Many of our cats are shown 7 days a week at the Petsmart on Sunrise in Plantation, and the  Petco at 8111 West Broward Blvd. in Plantation. The donation we are requesting is $60 and includes our medical program; all vaccines, rabies vaccine, fecal exam, de-worming, blood test for AIDS and Leukemia, spay or neuter, first month Advantage (flea treatment) plus a coupon for Science Diet food.

name: Chester
descriptionText: Meet Chester. He is 3 year old bloodhound. He is good with dogs, cats, adults and children. Chester is very laid back and looking for his loving forever home. Interested in adopting Chester? Please visit www.huskyhouse.org to fill out an application today.
